title: Blind Witness
description: Sometimes the greatest challenges bring the greatest rewards. Rachelle Harris might be blind, but it’s not going to keep her from helping her boss, Britton Clairbourne, stop a madman bent on destroying his company and killing him. Rachelle becomes the madman’s focus when she and Britt fall in love. It takes them both working together to survive.
author: Alysia S. Knight
